php-use.configuration.title: php use
php-use.configuration.showUnusedImportsD: Show diagnostics warnings for unused imports
php-use.configuration.diagnosticSeverity: Diagnostic severity level for unused imports
php-use.configuration.showNotifications: Show notification messages when performing extension actions
php-use.configuration.exclude: Glob patterns for files and folders to exclude from search
php-use.configuration.autoSortAfterImpor: Automatically sort namespace imports after adding new imports (default: alphabetically)
php-use.configuration.naturalSort: Sort imports using natural order algorithm (e.g., Item 2 comes before Item 10)
